metadata.title: CVE-2022-47094 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: GPAC MP4box 2.1-DEV-rev574-g9d5bb184b is vulnerable to Null pointerdereference via filters/dmx_m2ts.c:343 in m2tsdmx_declare_pid

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
